description: Creating inclusive technology solutions to connect people, companies, and organizations.
comingSoon: Currently under update and development. New version launching soon.
tincadiaDesc: Platform connecting deaf people, hearing people, and organizations through inclusive technology.
forBusinessDesc: Solutions for companies, educational entities, and organizations looking to make their services more accessible.
linkedinDesc: Posts about innovation, inclusive entrepreneurship, and participation in national events.
instagramDesc: Visual content about projects, trainings, and TINCADIA team progress.
facebookDesc: Dissemination of activities, calls, and collaborations with allied entities.
twitterDesc: News and brief updates on accessibility and technological innovation.
whatsappDesc: Official channel for information, events, and TINCADIA news.
youtubeDesc: Videos about inclusion, accessibility, and impact testimonials.
